metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26944 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Percona XtraBackup 2.4.20 unintentionally writes the command line to any resulting backup file output. This may include sensitive arguments passed at run time. In addition, when --history is passed at run time, this command line is also written to the PERCONA_SCHEMA.xtrabackup_history table. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-10997.

notes.Note: ccdm94> bionic and xenial do not include patches for CVE-2020-10997, as they are not vulnerable to CVE-2020-10997. Therefore, they are not affected by this issue as well.

criterions.comment: percona-xtrabackup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
